title: Ticket #3806: condor-admin silently dropping email
description:
From email: 

> > I sent this last week and never got an auto-ack from RUST… any idea why?
> >
> > -Peter
>
> No idea.  The CS Department here has been having some network issues,
> but I'd imagine your mail spool would have simple queued and resent the
> message later. I just sent a couple test messages to condor-admin and it
> seemed to be working.  Zach, could you please investigate the RUST logs
> from July 3rd and see if you observe anything?
>
> Todd

I see Peter's mail in the RUST logs, but for whatever reason no ticket was
created as a result.  I can't find any errors, nor was anything sent to
condor-system complaining about a malformed RUST, which is what sometimes
happens.

So, mail delivery worked.  RUST sucked, and as far as I can tell it did so
silently. :(


Cheers,
-zach

The only clue I can offer is that I attached some relevant logs, so the email was somewhat large (~3.5MB).
remarks: Dup ticket (unknowingly created despite server error at submit time).
creator: pfc
